subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Evan Lysacek became the first U.S. man to win the figure skating gold since 1988, upsetting the defending champion, Yevgeny Plushenko.
snippet: Evan Lysacek became the first U.S. man to win the figure skating gold since 1988, upsetting the defending champion, Yevgeny Plushenko.
